) VALUES ( GET_MGRNU('GT_A069_P'), NULL, #{cssNam}, #{peNam}, #{guNam}, #{dongNam}, #{schNam}, #{minX}, #{minY}, #{maxX}, #{maxY}, #{xce}, #{yce}, #{peCde}, #{guCde}, #{dongCde}, #{cssMgrnu}, #{schMgrnu}, #{liNam}, #{liCde}, #{jibun}, #{pnu}, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom}, 5181), #{eve}, #{rodNam}, #{rodMgrnu}, #{esbHit}, #{esbCpy}, #{mkCpy}, #{mkMdl}, #{mtNam}, #{knd}, #{cnnSite}, #{cnnMain}, #{cnnType}, #{asnMgrnu}, #{sprtMgrnu}, #{layLoca}, #{esbYmd}, #{sgr}, #{mgeChung}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MGRNU, '청주시' ||' '|| GU_NAM || ' ' || DONG_NAM || ' ' || RI_NAM || JIBUN AS ADDR, CTK_MGRNU, CSS_NAM, PE_NAM, GU_NAM, DONG_NAM, SCH_NAM, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, XCE, YCE, PE_CDE, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, CSS_MGRNU, SCH_MGRNU, RI_NAM, RI_CDE, JIBUN, PNU, XGEO, EVE, TO_CODE('ALL','EVE',EVE) AS EVE_NAM, ROD_NAM, ROD_MGRNU, ESB_HIT, ESB_CPY, MK_CPY, MK_MDL, MT_NAM, KND, TO_CODE('A069_P','KND',KND) AS KND_NAM, CNN_SITE, CNN_MAIN, SGR, MGE_CHUNG, CNN_TYPE, TO_CODE('A069_P','CNN_TYPE',CNN_TYPE) AS CNN_TYPE_NAM, ASN_MGRNU, LAY_LOCA, TO_CHAR(ESB_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ESB_YMD, SPRT_MGRNU, REG_YMD, UPT_YMD FROM GT_A069_P WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.update: UPDATE GT_A069_P SET EVE = #{eve}, ESB_YMD = #{esbYmd}, ESB_CPY = #{esbCpy}, SPRT_MGRNU = #{sprtMgrnu}, ASN_MGRNU = #{asnMgrnu}, KND = #{knd}, MK_MDL = #{mkMdl}, MK_CPY = #{mkCpy}, ESB_HIT = #{esbHit}, CNN_TYPE = #{cnnType}, CNN_SITE = #{cnnSite}, CNN_MAIN = #{cnnMain}, LAY_LOCA = #{layLoca}, SGR = #{sgr}, MGE_CHUNG = #{mgeChung}, UPT_YMD = SYSDATE, CTK_MGRNU = null, CSS_NAM = #{cssNam}, PE_NAM = #{peNam}, GU_NAM = #{guNam}, DONG_NAM = #{dongNam}, SCH_NAM = #{schNam}, PE_CDE = #{peCde}, GU_CDE = #{guCde}, DONG_CDE = #{dongCde}, CSS_MGRNU = #{cssMgrnu}, SCH_MGRNU = #{schMgrnu}, RI_NAM = #{liNam}, RI_CDE = #{liCde}, JIBUN = #{jibun}, PNU = #{pnu}, ROD_NAM = #{rodNam}, ROD_MGRNU = #{rodMgrnu}, XCE = #{pointXce}, YCE = #{pointYce}, MAXX = #{maxX}, MAXY = #{maxY}, MINX = #{minX}, MINY = #{minY}, XGEO = MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom},5181) WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, TEMP.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALROWS FROM ( SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORKTM, WORKUSER, WORK_BG FROM GT_A069_P_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC ) TEMP ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC, MGRNU ASC) TEMP WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rows} * ( #{page} - 1 ) + 1 AND #{rows}* #{page}
